headline: AOS Q1 Earnings Call: Tariffs, CEO Transition, and Operational Adjustments Shape Outlook
summary: Water heating and treatment solutions company A.O. Smith (NYSE:AOS) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 1.5% year on year to $963.9 million. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $3.85 billion at the midpoint came in 0.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.95 per share was 3.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
